sentence: [Sachi]::Hello there, Sakaki-san. Brazenly reading pornography in the dormitory lobby, are we?

sentence: [Sachi]::Not long at all. I happened to spot you as I was coming down the stairs, and reflexively executed a silent approach.

sentence: [Sachi]::Do you really want to know?

sentence: [Sachi]::In any case, Sakaki-san... is that magazine in your hands Tiger Girl, the periodical for the aggressive modern woman?

sentence: [Sachi]::When we first met, you were as sharp as a knife... or a box cutter, perhaps. You cut at everything that touched you...

sentence: [Sachi]::I apologize. It seems I took my little joke too far.

sentence: [Sachi]::It`s been a year since we`ve spoken like this, after all. I simply can`t help getting a bit carried away.

sentence: [Sachi]::But it`s the truth. We`ve all been longing for you and Kazami-san to return.

sentence: [Sachi]::On that note, please allow me to repeat this once more...

sentence: [Sachi]::Perish the thought, Sakaki-san. We`re overjoyed that the two of you have overcome the many trials and tribulations that stood in your way. You have our unconditional support.
